verbose_text: On the other hand, the shoot Cl - content increased at moderate rate from 0 to 200 mM NaCl, reaching 155.7 mg/g dry weight at 200 mM vs. 109.2 mg/g dry weight at 0 mM 50 mM NH 4 Cl treatment caused 16.5% increase of the shoot Cl - concentration compared to plants at 1 mM NH 4 Cl (average of all NaCl levels) but nearly constant at increasing NaCl concentrations (XREF_FIG E).
evidence: NH 4 Cl treatment caused 16.5% increase of the shoot Cl -  concentration compared to plants at 1 mM NH 4 Cl
